about_the_game:
The soundtrack to the RPG DEEP 8 offers a wide range of styles and moods on 70 tracks.
Inspiration for this were among others the following games, movies and composers:
Final Fantasy
Dino Crisis 2
Skies of Arcadia
Chelsea Wolfe
Danny Elfman
Brad Fiedel
Hans Zimmer
Metallica
Slipknot
Iggy Pop
Kevin Shields
Resident Evil 2
Chico Hamilton
Andrea Guerra
E.S. Posthumus
Deniz Akbulut
Akira Ifukube
Peter Connelly
Nathan McCree
Pixel Mixers
Harry Gregson-Williams
Limp Bizkit
Rammstein
Jimi Hendrix
Ennio Morricone
Steve Jablonsky
Zack Hemsey
Peter Joseph
RMB
Thomas Newman
Éric Serra
Tool
Yoko Shimomura

name: DEEP 8 Soundtrack
short_description: This is the original Soundtrack for the RPG DEEP 8.
